import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from '' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../product' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return(
Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}

{product.description}

Price:
${product.price}
Status:
{product.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
